attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Bound Value

attrs.name: placeholder
attrs.desc: Placeholder

attrs.name: tabindex
attrs.desc: Sets whether focus can be obtained by pressing Tab and the focus sequence. This parameter is valid only when readonly is set to false.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 1.

attrs.name: remote-search
attrs.desc: Configure remote search

attrs.name: before-reset
attrs.desc: Hook function before reset

attrs.name: resize
attrs.desc: Whether to display the full-screen button in the pop-up box
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: draggable
attrs.desc: Set whether the pop-up window can be dragged.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: showOverflow
attrs.desc: (When a grid table is nested in popeditor, it is configured in columns of the gridOp attribute.) Sets the display problem caused by excessively long table data. The value can be tooltip, title, or ellipsis;1tooltip: The extra part is displayed.... The prompt layer on the left or right displays all information. 2title: The value is the same as the title attribute of the native tag. 3ellipsis: The part that exceeds the content is displayed as..., and no prompt is displayed. 4true: If the value is true, the effect is the same as that of the tooltip.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Set the component size. The options are medium, small, and mini.

attrs.name: trigger
attrs.desc: In the table in the dialog box that is displayed, the radio is selected. The options are as follows: default (default), cell (clicking a cell), and row (clicking a row)

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Sets whether a component is disabled.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: conditions
attrs.desc: When a table is configured on the pop-up panel, set the table query items in the pop-up panel.

attrs.name: grid-op
attrs.desc: Set the configuration information of the table component in the pop-up panel.

attrs.name: pager-op
attrs.desc: Setting Pagination Configuration

attrs.name: icon
attrs.desc: Set the icon of the popEditor component. The default value is svg component

attrs.name: multi
attrs.desc: Specifies whether multiple data can be selected in the pop-up panel.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: popseletor
attrs.desc: Set the tree or table components that can be displayed in the pop-up panel.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is grid.

attrs.name: readonly
attrs.desc: Set [3.0] to read-only. If [3.0] is set to false, click the Ipunt box to display the selection box.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: show-clear-btn
attrs.desc: Specifies whether to display the Clear button on the right of the text box.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: show-pager
attrs.desc: Paging
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: show-history
attrs.desc: Specifies whether to display tables on the History tab page when tables are configured on the pop-up panel.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: text-field
attrs.desc: Set the text field in the text box. When data is submitted, the text is not submitted.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is label.

attrs.name: text-split
attrs.desc: Separator for displaying multiple records in the text box when multiple records are selected.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is /

attrs.name: title
attrs.desc: Set the title of the pop-up panel and support internationalization.

attrs.name: value-field
attrs.desc: Set the field to which data is to be submitted in the text box.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is id.

attrs.name: value-split
attrs.desc: Separator for submitting multiple pieces of data in the text box when multiple pieces of data are selected.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is;.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Wide of the pop-up panel, in pixels.When multi of a component is set to true, the minimum width is 900px. Otherwise, the minimum width is 600px.

attrs.name: dialog-class
attrs.desc: Customized configuration pop-up window class name

events.name: change
close
events.desc: Event triggered when the pop-up dialog box of the Popeditor component is closed.

events.name: page-change
events.desc: Indicates that the table mode of the Popeditor component is switched by page. ; onPageChange (arg1) {// arg1 = val arg1 is the page number. // do something you want...}
